description: Parameter descriptors for financial line item tool with disambiguation guidance

parameters.description: The specific financial line item to retrieve. Must match exact parameter names from the allowed list.
Specifies whether to retrieve annual or quarterly data. Required when requesting quarterly data.
common_mistakes: Forgetting to set period_type to 'quarterly' when requesting quarterly data

parameters.description: Starting year for the data range. Use calendar years, not fiscal years.
common_mistakes: Using fiscal years instead of calendar years
Not specifying when requesting historical data ranges

parameters.description: Ending year for the data range. Use calendar years, not fiscal years.
common_mistakes: Using fiscal years instead of calendar years

parameters.description: Starting quarter (1-4) when requesting quarterly data. Only used with period_type='quarterly'.
common_mistakes: Using string values like 'Q1' instead of integer 1

parameters.description: Ending quarter (1-4) when requesting quarterly data. Only used with period_type='quarterly'.
common_mistakes: Setting end_quarter before start_quarter in same year
Using string values like 'Q4' instead of integer 4
